import React from 'react'; import HeroSection from '../components/HeroSection'; import StreamSchedule from '../components/StreamSchedule'; import LatestVideos from '../components/LatestVideos'; import MerchShowcase from '../components/MerchShowcase'; const HomePage = () => { return (
{/* Latest stream embed */}

Latest Stream

{/* Community Section */}

Join Our Community

Become part of our fox den family! Connect with fellow fans and never miss updates.

Join Now →

Follow →

); }; export default HomePage;
